Title: Establishes a local government salt brine equipment grant program; appropriation
Summary: Establishes a local government salt brine equipment grant program under which the secretary of state may award matching grants to municipalities to cover costs associated with purchasing salt brine equipment.
LawCode: Amd ยง54, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing a local government salt brine equipment grant program; and making an appropriation therefor
